text: WORST Hungry Howies I‚Äôve ever been to, will not be returning, ever. First off they totally messed our salad up by forgetting ham (the main ingredient) and we asked for no black olives yet they were on AND gave us the wrong dressing. The ‚Ä¶More

name: Tyler Staruch
text: If you‚Äôre going to order from here make sure you‚Äôre not that hungry yet so you‚Äôre prepared for the wait. Also if you order pick up they won‚Äôt start making your food until you actually get there so don‚Äôt bother waiting for 20 minutes. Oh and they‚Äôll just make up how long how much time is left.

name: Britt S
text: Thank you to the wonderful woman who made my food. Wish I caught her name. Blonde hair, tattoos.. she not only had a mask on when she made my food!!! The previous three locations I went to they did not have masks on so I left... Best pizza and service. Thanks girl.

name: Nick Vinsant
text: So now they are using Doordash for delivery I guess? Kind of a joke tbh. The pizza takes 2 hours to even show up because they can't be bothered to deliver? Learn how to run a franchise.

name: Heather Alexander
text: We decided to grab pizza while we were out and Hungry Howie's had a great special going on. We ordered and paid online and had our pizzas in about 20 minutes. Both were fantastic. I'm not a huge fan of pizza, I know I'm weird, but it had just the right amount of toppings and seasoning on the crust.

name: yvonne sleight
text: Good food,  not ready when I arrived. Mix up with my order. Took 20 minutes to correct.

name: Dan Cezat
text: Manager is awesome,  food is amazing. However, my order has been messed up too many times to return. Delivery with a pizza missing, wrong toppings, etc. They usually do well to make it right, but it's not worth it. I'll be sticking to Jets from now on

name: Leanne Nicholson
text: Had issues with my pizza and with 3 small kids, it was really hard to return to the store to get a remake. Called the store and Larry was helpful by refunding the cost of my pizza and wanting to correct the situation by crediting us a pizza for the next time. Good customer service.

name: Jeremy Belson
text: One of the best pizzas I've ever eaten from hungry Howie's!  üëå and the customer service was phenomenal

text: To answer why I gave it 4 stars and not five, my pizza was over cooked and that wasn‚Äôt how I ordered it, also the toppings were messed up.  I didn‚Äôt call because it wasn‚Äôt that big of a deal, but if I was to get a free pie or stuffed crust upgrade, I think it would be something to get that extra star, Howard... üòâ
